definitions.definition: From the urban musical genre called grime .
Morally corrupt , malicious , vile , or selfish ; base or dirty ; rotten .
examples: When I was 18 I was grimy af . I wouldn't share my food with you even if you were starving and about to die.

definitions.definition: Darkly atmospheric ; having affinities with the style of the East Coast hip hop of the 90s , especially that of New York .
definitions.label_groups: slang , hip-hop , of a beat or song

secondary_definitions: ( music ) From the urban musical genre called grime .
( slang ) Morally corrupt , malicious , vile , or selfish ; base or dirty ; rotten .
( slang , hip-hop , of a beat or song ) Darkly atmospheric ; having affinities with the style of the East Coast hip hop of the 90s , especially that of New York .
